milestones.description: Next-generation COVID-19 vaccine designed for improved stability at refrigerator temperatures.
milestones.key_trial_results: Phase 3 study ongoing; data expected in early 2024

milestones.description: Combination vaccine for both COVID-19 and seasonal influenza, targeting annual immunization.
milestones.key_trial_results: Positive results in early trials; ongoing Phase 3 with data anticipated in 2024.

milestones.description: Standalone seasonal flu vaccine aimed at improved protection over standard flu vaccines.
milestones.key_trial_results: Met primary endpoints in Phase 3 trials; showed superior immune response compared to Fluzone HDÂ®.

milestones.description: RSV vaccine for prevention in older adults, particularly effective in preventing RSV-related lower respiratory disease.
milestones.key_trial_results: Filed with strong Phase 3 efficacy data.

milestones.description: Vaccine for prevention of CMV, a leading cause of birth defects.
milestones.key_trial_results: Phase 3 interim analysis expected by end of 2024.

milestones.description: Vaccine targeting norovirus, a leading cause of acute gastroenteritis worldwide.
milestones.key_trial_results: Phase 1 trial showed robust immune responses; pivotal Phase 3 trials expected to begin soon.

milestones.description: Personalized cancer vaccine in partnership with Merck, designed to improve outcomes in combination with Keytruda.
milestones.key_trial_results: Phase 3 trials ongoing with promising results in early trials.
